posts.subject: ZeroID needs to be go
posts.body:
Its going to kill the 8chan clone faster than spam and cp.

Instead just put a disclaimer in the front page on how to browse with Tor or use a VPN and you fix the anonymity problem. Its better for users to get rid of the spam then to have this place ded cause of the ZeroID
And why not just integrate the new Millchan code to the website instead of users manually updating it? Its going to confuse a lot of noobs and this place will be dead because of this and the ZeroID
Update your website with the Millchan code, remove ZeroID, add anonymity tutorial for noobs in the front page, and users mute content they don't want problem solved.

>>d4200889-bee4-4920-bfc6-182459e3895b
Bad move pal.
Should had just added instructions on how to use Tor for noobs in the front page of the website instead of the ZeroID. Thanks to the ZeroID a lot of threads are missing out and this place is more dead then it was with the spam/cp

>>b1bc3706-1a34-478c-ac0f-3ee5f97c9a8a
Admin should just integrate that version of Millchan to the website.

>>862bc11c-f1f9-4045-be10-c88e83a13af9

You have some good points will probably just create a new tutorial board, bump it, and have noobs visit it before visiting the other boards.

>>dd3efc61-205e-4e7a-8aed-f7a10b65e23c
Considering its decentralized and captchas won't work here, guess its the best we got.
Never Mind feel free to mute this thread will probably create a new id
